title: ulagam ellAm
sahitya:
ulagamellAm kalakaminri uLLam onri vAzhgavE uNmai anbu shUzhgavE


anupallavi

  nalivilAda kalvi selvap-pulamai Ongap-punmai nInga


caraNam    Ira nenjum eLiya naDaiyum Ighaiyum tyAgat-toNDum dhIra shankarAbhraNat-
tEnisai inimai pOla karuttum kalaiyum poruttamAna kavitai pOlak-kavarcci koNDE
